channel.title: My first server. i need help please
channel.description: Im pretty new at this whole thing, so first i'de like to say, call me anoob all you want, i dont care. All im hoping for are some kind people who know that everybody has to start somewhere, to please answer me. i started by following the "starting a new server" tut (sticky on the tut forums). So basically, i have a project 16 server, and its all connected and everything, i got my friend to log onto it from his house and he connected. so all of that is done, i just need some help with basic coding. Or prefferable, how to code to begin with, lol. thank you for helping =P.

item.title: My first server. i need help please
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

No problem , if you need more help use this thread "~!~Bryanc Help~!~ By me … me and tele are helping people there… enjoy

item.title: My first server. i need help please
item.dc:creator: @televator0 televator0
item.description:
@televator0 wrote:

well being the kind guy i am , i would suggest for you to get rid of project 16 and get a source from the download section that already have some kind of coding in it my suggestion for you is to get n0vascape v2 which is the download section near the top.

hoped it helped you out a little, tele
